websiteDescription: Portfolio of Cristian Encalada, showing his work and experience as a developer.
homeDescription: Relocated from Bolivia to Uruguay. I have 2+ years of experience as a QA Software Engineer. With a background as an Electronics Engineer, complemented by building several real-world projects involving technologies such as Python, Javascript, React and Node.js, I'm transitioning into a full-time career in software development.
contactFormP: Feel free to send me an email!
contactFormSuccess: Email sent successfully! Soon I'll be in touch with you. :)

projectDescription1: Personal blog where I share articles about the knowledge acquired along my learning journey.
projectDescription2: Web application that allows users to search and compare long-term rental properties from multiple sources in Montevideo - Uruguay.
projectDescription3: An interactive 3D page, built as a tribute to “The Little Prince”, novella by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry.
projectDescription4: Technical Interview Challenge. A web app that allows users to take notes, tag by categories, and filter them.
projectDescription5: Update of a outdated npm package that provides a  <MorphIcon/> component, able to change shapes between two icon types.
projectDescription6: Update of a outdated npm package that provides a <HoverButtonDiagonal> component, based on React Hooks
